Dialogue.Page: This slide reel appears to be another form of extraterrestrial communication, distinct from the far more common Nomai text.
Strangely, it uses a completely different style and materials from all forms of Nomai communication we have discovered.
Viewing the reel's contents has been simple due to the technology's similarity with our own slide projectors.
However, the slides contained within the reel do not appear to depict any known location within our solar system.
